ISSUE.TITLE: The color of the links in the Rich text (Blocks) field is not the right one
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## Bug report ### Required System information - Node.js version: 22.11.0 - Strapi version: 5.4.0 - Operating system: macOS - Is your project Javascript or Typescript: Typescript <!-- Did you know you can run `yarn strapi report` or `npm run strapi report` to get this information easier? --> ### Describe the bug The color of the links in the Rich text (Blocks) field is not the right one, making it impossible to differentiate from default text. ### Expected behavior The text color of a link should be `Primary600`. ### Screenshots ![CleanShot 2024-11-21 at 10 23 17@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/142f5e11-d104-4189-be88-e4dc51c80227)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: color of the links in the Rich text (Blocks) field is not the right one(#22230 ,#22259 )
fix: color missing in links of rich texts blocks (#22230)
